name: Leek & Potato Soup
title: Leek and Potato Soup
instructions: Prepare the vegetables: chop and clean the leeks, then peel and chop the potatoes. Chop large potatoes in half or quarters, no larger than ~1 inch.

Add 2-3 tablespoons of olive oil to a large pan (must be big enough to cook all the vegetables together) and set to a medium heat. Add some sliced garlic and butter for additional richness if you want
Cook the leeks for up to 10 minutes. Stir frequently, ensuring they don't burn.
Add the potatoes, vegetable stock and salt/pepper to taste. Simmer for 20 minutes.
In batches, blend the ingredients. Use the pulse if you prefer a chunkier soup. Serve and enjoy!
